--- In gladiator@y..., johnnyoldschool@e... wrote:
> say, i was making a new bunch of levels (considering the first ones 
i 
> made were dopey and impossible) and i decided to make a story based 
> on the main levels, as the Koren people go back to the beginning and 
> find all the places they fought at in ruins (well two so far) and 
> then they journey on to new areas.. and it's designed to go after 
the 
> main levels, so i keep myself from making it mad hard... and i was 
> wondering.. is it legal to do that? edit old levels and stuff? and 
> use the original names for the red army and stuff (hee hee, red 
> army)? i still keep their old names, basically, and use the level 
> titles as a guide..

Nothing illegal about that.

Personally, I have found after creating scenarios I gain a deaper 
understanding of how some of them work ('Cellars' from the tevfifty as 
an example.

If you have problems using the scenario editor, feel free to post 
questions here.
